metadata.title: CVE-2017-11721 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in ioquake3 before 2017-08-02 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted packet.

criterions.comment: ioquake3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.36+u20170803+dfsg1-1').
iortcw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.51+dfsg1-3').
